mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, email, password) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{password});
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, avatar = #{avatar}, description = #{description}, status = #{status} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (delete_flg = 0)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, email, password, avatar, description, status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM user WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, name, email, password, avatar, description, status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM user WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND email = #{email}
SELECT user_id, name, email, password, avatar, description, status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM user WHERE delete_flg = 0 LIMIT 1000
